text: Tony Curran (born 13 December 1969) is a BAFTA Award-winning Scottish actor who has appeared in Underworld: Evolution, Doctor Who, Roots, and the Netflix historical epic Outlaw King. Curran was born in Glasgow. He graduated from the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama. In 2012 he married Mai Nguyen; they had a daughter in September 2013. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Actors from Glasgow
title: Tony Curran
